---
labels: ['react', 'typescript', 'theme', 'compositions']
description: 'concrete documentation theme composition'
---

import { DocsTheme } from './docs-theme';
import styles from './layout.module.scss';

### Overview

This component is built on `@waweb/base-ui.theme.theme-provider` and used for compositions inside @waweb projects.  
Using theme compositions to center element for example:

```js live
<DocsTheme className={styles.center}>
  <div>This is a center element</div>
</DocsTheme>
```
